Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 7 Sāriputtasaṃyutta » 7.1 Sāriputtavagga
7.1.7 Ākiñcaññāyatanasutta
Sāriputtasaṃyutta
Sāriputtavagga
Ākiñcaññāyatanasutta
338.
1134Sāvatthinidānaṃ. Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto…pe…  “idhāhaṃ, āvuso, sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma, natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharāmi…pe…  vuṭṭhitoti vā”ti.
1135Sattamaṃ.
<< 7.1.6 Viññāṇañcāyatanasuttaup7.1.8 Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasutta >>
